lines.text:
[singing and skipping]
Here's the Easter Rabbit, hooray! / Making like funny, hooray! - Phooey! I'm glad I don't have to do this for a living.
I am getting looney tuney, touched in the head / This whole thing is gooney, I should have stood in bed.
I want an Easter egg! I want an Easter egg! I want an Easter egg!...
But you can't quit now. You'll give the Easter Rabbit a bad name.
I already have a bad name for the Easter Rabbit.
I can't miss with my Dick Tracy hat!

[as the Bratty Kid is twirling him around in the air]
How'd I get myself into this mess?
[the Bratty Kid drops Bugs on the floor]

[singing]
Hens work hard the eggs to lay, then I give them all away/Crazy Easter Rabbit, hoorayyyy!
It's the suspense that gets me.

[as Bugs and Elmer emerge from the Tunnel of Love]
I'll bet you say that to all the wabbits!
I'm waiting for the Easter Wabbit. When he comes in looking so fwuffy and cute with his wittle basket of Easter eggs... BANG! Easter Wabbit stew. He he he he.
Every year I get some dumb bunny to do my work for me.
Of course you know, this means war!
